rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment reports factual actions ('will test other flocks').
The segment does not contain a moderate verb paired with significant scale or impact.
This segment reports actions being taken (testing) without explicit calming language.
Segment does not contain a minimiser used with scale contrast.
The segment states the department will test other flocks but contains no bare negation.
Describes testing other flocks ('will test other flocks') as a response measure without active reassurance.
